title.home: A Pool de Mineração Mais Avançada
title.get_started_gpu: Minera {{coinName}} ({{coinTicker}}) usando uma rig de GPU

website_description.home: Flexpool.io é a pool de mineração mais avançada do mundo que permite minerar as tuas moedas favoritas de forma fácil. Suportamos Ethereum and Chia.
website_description.faq: As Perguntas Frequentes de um utilizador típico da Flexpool.io estão descritas aqui. Aqui podes aprender o significado de termos usados em pools e como solucionar problemas comuns.
website_description.miners: O Top 10 dos maiores mineradores da Flexpool.io e a distribuição dos mineradores por tamanho estão apresentados nesta página.
website_description.statistics: As estatísticas globais da pool são apresentadas nesta página. Podes ver o hashrate da pool, quantidade de mineradores, a sorte média e atual e o gráfico de hashrate global das últimas 24h.
website_description.support: A Flexpool.io oferece suporte através do bate-papo no website e através de um email dedicado ao suporte. Nesta página podes encontrar detalhes e instruções de como obter suporte.
website_description.contact: You can find out how to reach out Flexpool.io team on this page. Please note that the instructions on this page are for business-related purposes only. For support, please see the support page.
website_description.business_development: Instructions on contacting Flexpool.io for Business Development-related inquiries are located on this page
website_description.brand_assets: You can find Flexpool.io branding assets and brand guidelines on this page.
website_description.blocks: Blocks statistics are located on this page. Here you can find useful metrics like average and current luck, network hashrate and difficulty, blocks visualization, list of blocks, and many other things.
website_description.api_documentation: Comprehensive Flexpool APIv2 documentation is located on this page.
website_description.get_started_gpu: On this page, you can find an interactive guide on how to get started mining {{coinName}} ({{coinTicker}}) with {{coinAlgorithm}} using GPU rig on Flexpool.
website_description.get_started_nicehash: On this page, you can find an interactive guide on how to get started renting NiceHash to {{coinName}} ({{coinTicker}}) with {{coinAlgorithm}} on Flexpool.
website_description.get_started_chia_regular: On this page, you can find an interactive guide on how to get started farming {{coinName}} ({{coinTicker}}) using {{client}} on Flexpool.
website_description.get_started_home: On this page, you can find all our interactive get started guides on how to mine on Flexpool.
